text: @realDonaldTrump Hey!Don’t forget:Arizona is one of the 19 states with the trend of new coronavirus cases still increasing. Remember when donnie said and one day I will just disappear?And remember when he told the US to open back up? 0 for 2 donnie,you’re a loser “L”.  Back to the Bunker.Boy.
